items.sentence: I certainly had no idea Tom was studying French.
You haven\'t been a teacher very long, have you?
Can you recommend a good place to eat in Boston?
Can you remember that last time you ate ravioli?
Tom might be able to help you with your problem.
Tom might even be richer than we thought he was.
Tom moved to Boston with his family last summer.
Tom doesn\'t know who Mary went to the zoo with.
Tom doesn\'t know why the meeting was postponed.
Tom doesn\'t like being the center of attention.
